{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-10-05T17:39:19.000Z", "description": "

Role: ServiceNow Developer

Location: 100% Remote

Contract Duration: 6 Months


Requirements:

  • Experienced ServiceNow developers
  • Ability to create complex workflows using flow designer
  • Ability to create forms with automation fulfillment
  • Strong knowledge and understanding of ServiceNow data model and tables, especially for incident, change and CMDB
  • Knowledge of SN APIs
  • Network, server, or INF knowledge and experience is a \u2018plus\u2019 but not required


Responsibilities:

  • Replace work order templates using flow designer
  • Develop forms (including documentation)
  • Consult and help in development of the appropriate rest API to replace the ~100 automations across FI that use BMC ticket API
  • Consult other citizen developers with guardrails and solutions
